title: BMW group introduces Retail.NEXT in India
description: BMW has launched a new retail concept in India, allowing dealers to sell BMW, MINI, and BMW Motorrad products under one roof. The initiative, Retail.NEXT, involves a joint investment of Rs 365.6 crore across 33 cities over 36 months. This aims to enhance customer engagement through integrated 'phygital' innovations.
